version_description:
Control groups of WeMo devices:
Create groups of WeMo devices and control them on the new "Groups" tab.
Turn On or Off all the devices of a group.

• Add groups on Today Widget and Apple Watch
• Add option to show/hide selected devices or groups from Today Widget or Apple Watch
To hide a device, go to device info screen (tap on the device row on main app) and set the "Visible on Today Widget" option Off
• Improve device detection
Add support for Wemo Mini Smart Plug devices

Add Home Screen Quick Actions:
"All devices On"
"All devices Off"

Add version number info on main menu.
Show alert message if no device selected on a new Group.
Dark UI improvements.
